name: Lavender Town
description: Lavender Town is an in-progress rhythm game demo made using the PICO-8 engine. Arrow key notes will begin to ascend from the bottom of the screen; pressing the respective arrow key when they reach the hit zone (their silhouette) will increase your score and combo meter. The music used is a version of the theme from Lavender Town in the first generation of Pokemon games, made using the sound editor in PICO-8.
